content:
Hey, to get a feel for the new Compiler and Roc itself I've been hacking on a Rust platform over the weekend.
It's pretty much equivalent to https://github.com/lukewilliamboswell/roc-platform-template-zig.

I have never really written any FFI stuff in Rust until now so beware of undefined behavior and friends :-).
So even though it's very hacky maybe it can serve as inspiration for someone.
https://codeberg.org/johanneshorner/roc-platform-rust
